data.description:
What a great deal!!!! Get ready to put all of your remodeling ideas into practice. One level living. Main fl laundry, plenty of natural light. This home is in a wonderful neighborhood, in the impressive Lindbergh School District. This home offers easy access to Highways 44 and 270 or Watson and Big Bend Rds. Near Grant''s Trail, eateries, restaurants and businesses galore.

Offers will be reviewed as received.
